image:image.image:title: Miromar Outlets features top designer and brand name outlet stores offering savings up to 70% off retail pricing. Shop the latest fashions at Saks Fifth Avenue Off 5th, Bloomingdales The Outlet Store, HM, Polo Ralph Lauren Factory Store, Nike Factory Store, Abercrombie and Fitch Outlet, Calvin Klein, Coach Factory, Cole Haan Outlet, Movado Company Store, Kate Spade, Under Armour, American Eagle Outfitters, Michael Kors, Sperry, Levi’s, Skechers, Tommy Hilfiger, Columbia Sportswear Company, Reebok, White House/Black Market, Vera Bradley, Adidas, Vineyard Vines and more. Enjoy an outdoor shopping experience with sunlit courtyards, covered walkways, colorful gardens, lush landscaping, and 10 fountains and koi ponds that are home to turtles and a family of Pekin ducks. Miromar Outlets also offers an award-winning children’s playground with rock-climbing FunWalls, a year-round event and entertainment calendar, and an array of restaurants with indoor and outdoor seating.

Open daily 8am-sunset. This utopian community of 200 which believed the entire universe existed within a giant, hollow sphere relocated from New York to Florida in 1894. The Koreshans built and operated a printing facility, boat works, cement works, sawmill, bakery, store and hostelry. Education, science and art also helped shape their community. After their leader's death in 1908, membership declined. In 1961, the remaining members deeded 305 acres of their land to the state of Florida as a park and memorial. The Koreshan Unity Settlement Historic District is on the National Register of Historic Places. Guided tours available.

The Park in the heart of the Village. The Happehatchee Center is a sanctuary in nature with weekly Healing Circles and Yoga. Although the parking lot is located close to Corkscrew RD, you soon find yourself surrounded by old pines, oaks and palms as you walk the path to the main campus and the Peace Pavilion, past a pond, picnic tables, butterfly garden and nursery.

Located at Coconut Point Mall in Estero next to Panera, Florida COCO Art Gallery is a nonprofit cooperative operated by the Art Council of Southwest Florida. It is a year-round 7,000 square foot venue for exhibiting and selling the original artwork of the talented artists who are members of the Art Council's 21 affiliate organizations. ​ Participating artists offer oil, pastel, acrylic and watercolor paintings, photography, ceramics, glass, textiles, jewelry, wood, statues, seasonal cards fiber art and more. PLEASE NOTE THAT THE GALLERY IS CLOSED THE FIRST TUESDAY OF EACH MONTH FOR INVENTORY PURPOSES

Sunshine Limo is a luxury ground transportation chauffeured service that specializes in delivering executive transportation and unforgettable red carpet experiences. We proudly have been serving Florida since 2015 and committed to providing the same level of service for many more years to come.

Miromar Outlets is pleased to host a Saturday, year round, farmers market with fresh porduce, loca seafood, cold pressed juices, authentic Mexican tamales, handmade jewelry, customized jewelry and unique gift items.

Our Yoga Place | Premium Hot Yoga (Bikram) | Vinyasa Flow and Stretch Yoga. State of the art facilities, We sanitize using UV lighting / Superior Grade Ventilation. All levels welcome. New Member Offer $50 two week unlimited yoga pass.

Gulfshore Opera is a regional opera company founded with core values of a community based creative collaboration. Serving Collier, Lee and Charlotte Counties, it seeks to enrich the community by presenting high quality opera theater and classical vocal music, and promotes community well-being through musical education programs.

In April of 2008, Angelina’s Ristorante opened its doors in Bonita Springs, Florida, and ushered in guests to a Mediterranean oasis of delicious food, fine wines, and the promise of incomparable experiences. More than a decade later, we are now one of Southwest Florida’s most awarded restaurants and we are still just as passionate about providing Unmatched Fine Italian in all aspects. Your unmatched experience begins at the door with our friendly, complimentary valet. While you’re guided to your table, you'll hear live piano music drifting through the dining rooms and take in the spectacular sight that is our unique 30-foot refrigerated wine tower containing more than 4,000 bottles from around the world. Our meticulously trained service staff will then wine, dine, and dazzle you with traditional Italian hospitality. When your evening comes to an end, we hope you are departing with delightful, unmatched memories and plans to come and see us again soon.

Divieto offers a unique concept that exquisitely fuses traditional Italian, and classic American cuisines, with the quality and service of the finest venues, in an inviting and fun ambiance. Over 70 signature dishes including its renowned Ruota di Parmigiano, a tableside experience, where creamy Fettuccine Alfredo is tossed and finished inside of a Parmigiano Reggiano cheese wheel. Divieto's full bar offers a wide selection of wines, plus signature and classical cocktails.

Naples Flatbread started the flatbread craze back in 2009--with bold, sensual flavor combinations served on a house made crust (regular and cauliflower) and cooked in a fiery hearth oven. While flatbreads made them famous, they are so much more. The menu is dynamic--with items like Neapolitan pizza, gourmet baked pastas, flatbread encrusted Wagyu burgers, and a variety of mouth-watering gourmet mac and cheese'. Oven-roasted wings, warm Panini's, Taco's, Wraps, overflowing salads and scrumptious desserts complete the seemingly endless list of options. Sharing the spotlight is a 54 Adult Beverage Self Service Tap Wall including award winning beers, hard ciders, wine, CBD beverages, cocktails and more. Plus a full-service bar, our famous $6 Premium and $8 Ultra Premium Cocktails, and over 50 exotic bourbons tequilas!

Enjoy gorgeous fountain and lake views from the screened porch of this Florida inspired seafood restaurant. Jutting out over the water, Tarpon Bay has a beach cottage vibe, where colorful lanterns keep watch over each table and a palette of soft turquoise and creamy beige complement the lush gardens just beyond our doors. Our chef infuses the freshest seafood with innovative combinations of herbs and spices for a truly memorable meal, designed to match the fresh and lively scenery. Find a seat at the inviting bar for a drink, while enjoying fantastic live music on Friday and Saturday nights, and Sunday mornings. You'll be in for a truly memorable experience.

Ruth's Chris Steak House specializes in serving USDA Prime steaks, each seared to perfection, finished with butter and freshly chopped parsley, and served sizzling on a 500-degree plate. We invite you to join us in Bonita Springs, FL!

Ford's Garage Estero is your top pit stop for the most delicious prime burgers, comfort food and delectable deserts. Conveniently located in the Miromar Outlets, on the corner of Ben Hill Griffin Pkwy and Corkscrew Rd in Estero

First Watch specializes in delicious creations freshly-prepared to order. First Watch begins each morning at the crack of dawn, slicing fresh fruits and vegetables, baking muffins and making French toast batter from scratch. Their fresh, award-winning Breakfast, Brunch and Lunch dishes are made using only the best ingredients without the use of heat lamps or deep fryers. The best part is their creative menu features traditional favorites like omelets, pancakes, salads and sandwiches, as well as signature items like the Chickichanga and classic BLTE sandwich. Their "2 for You" lunch offers half portions of their most popular soups, salads and sandwiches and you can get in and out fast. Their menu's "Healthier Side" features a variety of delicious Breakfast, Brunch and Lunch options for the more health-conscious, including egg white omelets, fresh fruit crepes and their signature Power Wrap. Free WiFi newspapers are provided.

South Fork Grille presents to it's patrons a non-intimidating and pleasurable atmosphere in which to enjoy great lunch and dinner! South Fork Grille specialize in procurement of local foods when possible, such as local grown vegetables, Gulf shrimp, Grouper, Snapper. Also, compliments dinner with a unique wine list that's been selected for great taste and affordable, In addition to offering great wines, we present a full dinner menu with homemade desserts, complimented with ports, espresso, cappuccino and latte.

Chops City Grill is a “steak house’s” steak house! After 20 years newly remodeled and with a dynamic new menu and wine list, Chops is proud to present the best in “in house” dry aged Prime, American, certified Japanese and Australian wagyu steaks … for less! With over 100 whiskey selections, along with a 350 bottle wine list, creative craft cocktails and non-alcoholic selections, Chops pays homage to the great American steak house …

Located in beautiful Estero, the Marlin Bar is a relaxed refuge that pays homage to the laid-back way of living that southwestern Florida is known for. Featuring a spacious patio and walk-up bar where you can unwind with a cocktail and light fare, then stop by the store for a little retail therapy.
Pizza und Pasta in allen Variationen

Access limited to resort guests. With its casual, tropical atmosphere, Corkscrew is the place for Hyatt resort guests to unwind. Relax while the kids play in the adventure pool with service provided right to your poolside chaise or grab some shade under one of the umbrella tables. We offer a full service cocktail bar with frozen tropical drinks, domestic and imported beers, and frozen tropical drinks, domestic, imported and local craft beers. Our lunch menu features burgers, wraps, hot and cold sandwiches, garden fresh salads, kid’s menu, fruit and soft drinks. - Access for resort guests only.

Ted's Montana Grill serves time-honored American favorites in an atmosphere inspired by the hospitality, food and spirit of the Old West. Our mission is to give guests a fresh, authentic and original experience with every visit. Ted's Montana Grill's made-from-scratch menu is known for our premium hand-cut steaks and gourmet burgers. The menu also offers a variety of time-honored favorites such as crab cakes, cedar plank salmon, daily soups, seasonal vegetables, and house-made desserts. Open for Lunch and Dinner daily.

Food you love in a casual dining, sports-themed experience. With locations throughout Florida, you are sure to have one nearby. Eat. Drink. Earn free meals. Enjoy all the perks of being an MVP! At Duffy's, Our Game Is Always On.
Family Owned And Operated. Serving SWFL since 1991.

All of your favorites are just a few clicks away! View our menu online and Order Now for convenient Carside Delivery or come in for our famous never-ending first course of freshly baked breadsticks and your choice of homemade soup or garden fresh salad. Enjoy abundant portions of classic Italian favorites the whole family craves like the Tour of Italy, our irresistible Chicken Parmigiana, or everyone's favorite Fettuccine Alfredo, made fresh from our kitchen to your table. Gather together with the people you love over a meal worth sharing at Olive Garden. We're all family here.
ANY (Anthony's New York) Pizzeria is a family-owned pizzeria in Bonita Springs/Estero. We offer the best Italian food and pizza in Estero Florida! Come see us in The Brooks Town Center.
Trattoria Pizzeria Executive Chef Anna Longobardi and her 3 Son's from Naples, Italy Forza Napoli Sempre!
Enjoy traditional Mexican food and beach vibes in the heart of Estero, Florida.

Savor your favorite dishes, artfully updated with exotic flavors and interesting ingredients, all day long in our AAA Four-Diamond restaurant. In our newly renovated dining room and expanded kitchen, international cuisine takes center stage, as our Executive Chef consistently delivers "comfortable food with an exciting twist." Join us for our Breakfast Buffet, Lunch or Dinner served daily.

Since it was founded in 1958 as a single pancake house in Ohio, Perkins today has nearly 300 restaurants in 32 states and Canada, of which approximately 85 are company-owned. Committed to delivering 100% satisfaction through service excellence and positive dining experiences, the brand embraces a "Kindness Served Daily" philosophy.

The Saloon is a fun and casual restaurant created to affordably showcase the best in American cuisine and cocktails. We’ve created a light and healthy menu that specializes in hand cut steaks and seafood grilled over a roaring hickory and applewood fire served along with classic American barbeque, creative entrees, sandwiches and homemade desserts. We have also created over 50 original Saloon cocktails and feature those along side hundreds of traditional classics, highlighting American craft spirits new and old …

Our Story THE GIFT OF HOSPITALITY Zino can be defined as the ultimate gift from Zeus - a gift of hospitality. The origins of the Name may be lost to a different time, but at Zino Ristorante, we want to redefine the hospitality experience for our diners. On August 1st, 2019, we opened our doors as the newest Italian American Restaurant in Estero to provide an experience like no other based on this concept of superior service. Come join us for the freshest Italian and SW Florida fare against a backdrop of hospitality, kindness, and exceptional experience. Our carefully crafted cocktails and martinis are second to none in Southwest Florida. Have our Expert Mixologist, trained and experienced at the finest Bars Hotels in Las Vegas, transform your palate with his knowledge of the freshest ingredients. Our Chefs will wow you with your favorites from our classic Veal Parmigiana to the best seafood dish in town - our famous Pan Seared Walleye.
Inspired by different regions across South America, adding a modern twist to Peruvian cuisine in a casual lounge setting with lively atmosphere.

Lehne Burger is a family-friendly restaurant where you can completely customize your Burger from scratch with more than 85,000 possible combinations, including vegan, vegetarian and gluten-free options. All Burgers are made to order and paired with a homemade Milkshake or an ice-cold Craft Beer you will be in “Burger Heaven”. Home of design your own burger

Mellow Mushroom Pizza Bakers has been serving up fresh, stone-baked pizzas to order in an eclectic, art-filled, and family-friendly environment. Each Mellow is locally owned and operated and provides a unique feel focused around great customer service and high-quality food. Mellow is a state of mind, a culture, a way of being. Our mission is to provide delicious food in a fun and creative environment. We are the originators of hand tossed, stone baked classic southern pizza. Our spring water crust is unique and flavorful, and all our pies are made with high quality, fresh ingredients. Our philosophy is to elevate the dining experience with a higher order of pizza. Mellow out...

Thank you for your interest in Ristorante Farfalla. We will take great delight in hosting your dinner party, and hope that we can assist you in planning your special evening. Whether you are looking for the perfect setting for a small group or large party, our elegant tables, discrete alcoves and private dining room will accommodate you. Our unsurpassed service and attention to detail is legendary. Our nationally acclaimed cuisine has received the highest, world-renowned culinary awards. We hope that you will select Ristorante Farfalla for an experience in exceptional dining while enjoying the Estero area. Luncheons By Appointment
Located in a big outlet mall just south of Ft Myers, Floria.

Zino Pizzeria is now open! Right next door to our famous Zino Ristorante, we now offer casual dining and to go Pizza - the best in SWFL! Try our NY Crust, generous toppings, and specialty pizzas while enjoying a beer or cocktail from our full bar. Homemade Subs Heros and a daily lunch special - all items at $7.99! We are also offering homemade soups daily with over 10 choices made right here in house. Try our Italian Wedding, Pasta Fagioli, Chicken Tortellini and more.

The Rookery at The Brooks serves the residents of the Brooks Community: Shadow Wood Country Club, Spring Run, Lighthouse Bay, and Copperleaf. Located at The Commons Club, the restaurant borders an estuary and and park-like green. Lunch is served in season and dinner throughout the year. The Rookery also features a Smoothie Bar, Ice Cream Shoppe and Lobster Events at its Beach Club in the summer.Private events are often featured both inside the restaurant and lakeside in an elegant al fresco setting. Wedding ceremonies are hosted both at the Beach Club and under the waterside Gazebo. Wedding Receptions are also popular in the beautiful setting.
Next Stop Brunch. Freshly made breakfast and lunch sandwiches. Quick and convenient Brunch and coffee. Try our Signature Iced Joe.
Amazing wines and more... Wine Bar/Wine Shop

The Bistro at Miromar Design Center offers gourmet foods, coffees, beer and wine in a cozy setting. Stop in for a coffee, lunch, a light snack or just a glass of wine. Catering is available for special events from The Bistro. The Bistro is located on the first floor of the Miromar Design Center. Open from 9:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. Monday through Friday and 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. on Saturday and Sunday.

fibrre, GET MORE! That's our motto. fibrre (pronounced fiber) is a plant-based restaurant that aims to provide food that is well balanced, fibrous, and nutritionally dense. "A judgement free plant based restaurant, that supports and educates those seeking to try, transition to or maintain a healthy diet. We are vegan, vegetarian, and gluten free friendly." With a menu that consist of weight loss smoothies, meals, burgers, salads, and vegan desserts.

We are committed to serving only the highest quality and freshest foods, always prepared to your desired taste. Relax and enjoy our three-country cuisine style and our professional service with a personal touch. We can now be your choice for special occasions, rehearsal dinners, business meetings, company parties and more..
